title: NoSleep Podcast - Sleepless Decompositions Vol. 5
description:
Our Halloween Month of Horror continues with the first of two Sleepless Decompositions episodes this month.

"Sunfall" written by S.H. Cooper (Story starts around 00:02:00)
TRIGGER WARNING!
Produced by: Phil Michalski
Evelyn – Sarah Thomas, Kendra – Erin Lillis, Oula – Nikolle Doolin, Dad – Jesse Cornett, The Gardener voices performed by – Erika Sanderson, Jeff Clement, Danielle McRae, Graham Rowat

Click here to learn more about The NoSleep Podcast team
Click here to for Season Pass 17
Click here to learn more about S.H. Cooper
Click here to learn more about S.H. Cooper's novel, "Inheriting Her Ghosts"
 
Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
Musical score composed by: Brandon Boone
"Sleepless Decompositions" illustration courtesy of Kelly Turnbull
